snippet: LEVINE--Noel. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem mourn the death of our dear friend and generous donor, Noel Levine. Noel's commitment to the Museum, was exceptional. He and his wife, Harriette, gifted one of the most comprehensive private collections of 19th century through classic modern photography, accompanied by an endowment for the Museum's Noel and Harriette Levine Department of Photography. We extend deepest condolences to the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co-chairs, AFIM; Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM; James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher, Dir., IMJ; Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem mourn the death of our dear friend and generous donor, Noel Levine. Noel's commitment to the Museum, was exceptional. He and his wife, Harriette, gifted one of the most comprehensive private collections of 19th century through classic modern photography, accompanied by an endowment for the Museum's Noel and Harriette Levine Department of Photography. We extend deepest condolences to the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co-chairs, AFIM; Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM; James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher, Dir., IMJ; Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
